mil.emp3.mapengine.events

Class MapInstanceViewChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>
      • mil.emp3.mapengine.events.MapInstanceViewChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>

    public class MapInstanceViewChangeEvent
extends Event<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>
    This class implements the Map Instance View Change Event. It must be generated by all map engine instances when the viewing area of the map changes. All events of this type are handled by the EMP core code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapInstanceViewChangeEvent(IMapInstance oMapInstance, MapViewEventEnum viewEventEnum, ICamera camera, ILookAt lookAt, IGeoBounds bounds, int iWidth, int iHeight)
      This constructor must be called by the map engines to create a MapInstanceViewChangeEvent event

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IGeoBounds getBounds()
      Returns the map bounds after the event, it could be null based camera settings.
      ICamera getCamera()
      Returns the updated Camera object after the event.
      ILookAt getLookAt()
      Returns the updated lookAt object after the event.
      int getMapViewHeight()
      Returns height of the map in pixels
      int getMapViewWidth()
      Returns width of the map in pixels

        getEvent, getTarget

      • MapInstanceViewChangeEvent

        public MapInstanceViewChangeEvent(IMapInstance oMapInstance,
                                  MapViewEventEnum viewEventEnum,
                                  ICamera camera,
                                  ILookAt lookAt,
                                  IGeoBounds bounds,
                                  int iWidth,
                                  int iHeight)
        This constructor must be called by the map engines to create a MapInstanceViewChangeEvent event
        Parameters:
        oMapInstance - The actual map instance. The this property of the object that implements the IMapInstance interface.
        viewEventEnum - The view event generated. See MapViewEventEnum
        camera - The new camera position of the view of the map. See ICamera.
        bounds - The new view bounds.
